lyrics:
Greek
Greek script
Translation



Greek
Tipota de menei, tipota de zei
Ola svinoun, chanontai, san ilios, sa vrochi
Ma pano apo sena, pano apo mena
Pano ap’ ola yparchei
Mono i agapi, mono i agapi
Mono i agapi kai zei kathe stigmi
Mono i agapi, mono i agapi
Mono i agapi kai zei
Ti ‘nai i zoi mas, ligo an to skefteis
Tha ‘kleines ta matia sou, de tha ‘theles na deis
Ma piso ap’ ta lathi, t’ anthropina pathi
Pano ap’ ola yparchei
Mono i agapi, mono i agapi
Mono i agapi kai zei kathe stigmi
Mono i agapi, mono i agapi
Mono i agapi kai zei, kai zei
I zoi mas perna, ki oti fevgei pona
Piso de gyrna, ki omos kati mas krata
Mono i agapi, mono i agapi
Mono i agapi kai zei kathe stigmi
Mono i agapi, mono i agapi
Mono i agapi kai zei
Mono i agapi, mono i agapi
Mono i agapi kai zei
